title: फ़ैक्ट चेक : भारत-चीन सीमा पर हाल में हुई झड़प के नाम पर वायरल वीडियो पुराना निकला

vclaim: Can anyone verify the authenticity of this video? If it is true, it goes against Indian media report of Indian troops confronting Chinese troops in Sikkim and forcing them to go back, It is opposite rather. https://t.co/lPv7AEuA1T
